
{{{class="brush:c++"

//-------------------------------------------------------------------------
//function		:   uniform
//description	:   generate uniform distributed random numbers
//input			:   a: upper limit ; b : lower limit ; 
//return		:    
//others		:    
//-------------------------------------------------------------------------
double uniform(float a, float b, long int *seed)
{
    double t ;
    *seed = 2045 *(*seed) + 1 ;
    *seed = *seed - (*seed/1048576) * 1048576 ;
    t = (*seed) / 1048576.0 ;
    t = a + (b - a) * t ;
    return t ;
}
}}}
